comment: Accidentally freeded up space on my phone because of the garbage "Free up space" button that I though would free up space on the Google Photos. Now all my photos completely erased from my phone, and there're also some photos that I like even it has a bad quality or blurry. Probably leave -5 star if I'm able to and then throw this app to the trash can if I don't have photos there. Rather lost my memory or phone than backing up my new photos or videos to the app.
scenarios: Press the "Free up space" button on the Google Photos app, believing it would free up space on Google Photos, leading to the deletion of all photos from the user's phone.
key sentence: Press the "Free up space" button on the Google Photos app, believing it would free up space on Google Photos, leading to the deletion of all photos from the user's phone.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to navigate to library/memories/search, cast content, back up photos, favorite items, and access various editing and sharing options.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Account Settings', 'description': 'Accessing and managing account settings'}, {'name': 'Turn ON/OFF Backup', 'description': 'Turn on or turn off backup.'}, {'name': 'Free Up Space', 'description': 'Deleting and managing storage space for photos'}, {'name': 'Photos Settings', 'description': 'Adjusting various settings related to photos'}, {'name': 'Help and Feedback', 'description': 'Accessing help and feedback options'}, {'name': 'Privacy Policy', 'description': 'Viewing the privacy policy'}, {'name': 'Terms of Service', 'description': 'Viewing the terms of service'}]
